content:
I'm thinking out loud in the comments as I work on https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/91866.

I'd love feedback from the team if people have time :)
The easiest way to make options inaccessible to queries is probably to make sess private in the GlobalCtxt. Accesses to it should gradually be converted to using a getter that accesses information.
Does making that sess field private complimentary to doing this? https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/91866/commits/658e745071fb093b6fe13b034b92ab24ae988df1
Or is that change not really needed?
